content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Experience the entire Trine story with this bundle that includes Trine Enchanted Edition and Trine 2: Complete Story.

The Trine games are sidescrolling, physics-based games of action, puzzles and platforming, set in a storybook-like world filled with strange machinery, dangerous foes and beautiful sights. You control three different characters: Amadeus the Wizard, Pontius the Knight and Zoya the Thief, and use their combined skills to overcome obstacles, solve puzzles and fight to save the Kingdom.

Trine Enchanted Edition:
1 player
Network Players 2-3
2GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
3D Game
1080p HD Video Output
Online Play (Optional)

Trine 2: Complete Story:
1 player
Network Players 2-3
3GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
3D Game
1080p HD Video Output
Online Play (Optional)

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service).
